reviews.content:
The tweak keeps reverting back to default colors (which is a pale pink)

Border Radius is completely not working

Modifications only affect the dial button, and not the number pad.

Looking forward to a working alternative.
Using iPhone XR, iOS 12.1

Phone app cannot be opened (crashed) after install.

Model: iPhone Xs
Firmware : iOS 12.1.1
Jailbreak: Chimera 1.0.4
